articles.title: Afghan soldiers trained by UK and US forces have defected and are fighting for the Taliban, sources - Daily Mail
articles.description: British army officers have analysed recent images of the Taliban using their weapons and they believe some of the fighters are using techniques they learned from British and American forces.
articles.content:

articles.title: Newly discovered dinosaur predated tyrannosaurs — and at the time was a bigger apex predator - CBC.ca
articles.description: A previously unknown species may become another piece in the puzzle of how tyrannosaurs took over and ruled Asia and North America for millennia.
articles.content:
It's roughly 90 million years ago, the Cretaceous period, and continents have begun to rift apart.

articles.title: Children make up more than a quarter of the weekly US COVID-19 cases, pediatricians' group says - CNN Philippines
articles.description: Children now represent more than a quarter -- or 26.8% -- of weekly COVID-19 cases nationwide, according to data released Tuesday from the American Academy of Pediatrics (AAP).
